-- 5. External table for loans.csv
IF OBJECT_ID('external_loans','U') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE external_loans;
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE external_loans
(
    loan_id VARCHAR(500),
    customer_id VARCHAR(500),
    loan_amount VARCHAR(200),
    loan_purpose VARCHAR(200),
    loan_term_months VARCHAR(200),
    interest_rate VARCHAR(200),
    issue_date VARCHAR(200),
    loan_status VARCHAR(200)
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'loans.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = bank_raw_data_adls,
    FILE_FORMAT = fmt_csv
);
GO

INSERT INTO BankCredit.stg_loans
SELECT * FROM external_loans;
GO

SELECT 'stg_loans' AS table_name, COUNT(*) AS rows_loaded FROM BankCredit.stg_loans;
GO
